LAYERSHOP_DESCRIPTION: Opens Sofi's shop to view all Layers currently available for purchase
BUY_LAYER_INFO:
Use the `{{prefix}}buy layer <Layer-ID> <Amount>` command to buy a **Layer** 
[Click here to view all available **Layers**](https://sofi.gg/layers)
LAYERSHOP_EXTRA_INFO: Opens Sofi's shop to view all Layers currently available for purchase for your cards. Clicking on any of the names will open an image showcasing the specific Layer
